abstract: In this week's Complaint Box: The dangers posed by food delivery workers riding motorized bicycles.
snippet: In this week's Complaint Box: The dangers posed by food delivery workers riding motorized bicycles.
lead_paragraph: Like everyone else, I like to order pizza or other takeout food and have it at my door and still warm in 15 to 20 minutes. But a recent encounter with a deliveryman on a bicycle that had been souped up with an electric motor - the type that is becoming ubiquitous in neighborhoods throughout the city - alerted me to the perils to pedestrians that the drivers of these illegally motorized vehicles can cause.
